sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Good newes from the assembly in Scotland, now sitting in consultation, concerning their ecclesiasticall government in the church. Exhibited to this Parliament in England, concerning this present reformation in England, with their heartie desires this ensuing treatise may be forthwith enacted; for the satisfaction of all good subjects, here or elsewhere. From Edenburgh, August 4. 1642. Scotland. Parliament.
[2] 6 p.
printed for J. W., London : 1642.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "August 10th". Printers device (McK. 268-272 var.) on t.p. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Good newes from the assembly in Scotland, now sitting in consultation, concerning their ecclesiasticall government in the church. Exhibited to this Parliament in England, concerning this present reformation in England, with their heartie desires this ensuing treatise may be forthwith enacted; for the satisfaction of all good subjects, here or elsewhere. From Edenburgh, August 4. 1642. Scotland. Parliament.
[2] 6 p.
printed for J. W., London : 1642.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "August 10th". Printers device (McK. 268-272 var.) on t.p. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
J. W.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
